tier_verification: Mixed content - C1 and C4 are legitimate tier 1 internal optimization cases. C8-C11 appear to be tier 1 content (AI as product/revenue driver). C2,C3,C5,C6,C7 are standard financial metrics not relevant to AI capability assessment.
